title: Muqam chairs meeting regarding rightsizing of KA&GB ministry
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 11 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs & Gilgit Baltistan and SAFRON, Engr Amir Muqam on Thursday chaired a meeting regarding rightsizing of the ministry of KA&GB and its attached departments at AJK Council.
The meeting was attended by Secretary Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit Baltistan Waseem Ajmal Chaudhry and other officers from ministry, AJK and GB Councils, said a press release.
The meeting deliberated and discussed proposed recommendations of the Ministry of Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit Baltistan in the meeting.
The minister directed the officials to finalize the recommendations on urgent basis for submission to the committee constituted by the Prime Minister on rightsizing of the federal government.
